languages.text:
"День 21, третий месяц цикла...
Вот это удача, привалило так привалило! Этот ксеносский торгаш, стрикс попался как нельзя кстати — последнее время конкуренты плодятся, как вши в полудохлой крысе. Мерд'Ки уже натаскал(а??) кучу редкого барахла — я в жизни столько денег за один заказ не получал. Ну, теперь-то заживем!"

traits.locale_text:
"День 21, третий месяц цикла...
Вот это удача, привалило так привалило! Этот ксеносский торгаш, стрикс попался как нельзя кстати — последнее время конкуренты плодятся, как вши в полудохлой крысе. Мерд'Ки уже натаскал(а??) кучу редкого барахла — я в жизни столько денег за один заказ не получал. Ну, теперь-то заживем!"

languages.text:
"Day twenty-one, third month of the cycle...
Now that's what I call good fortune! We hit the jackpot. This xenos peddler, a Stryxis, sure did show up in time, the competitors have been popping up like fleas on a half-dead rat. Merd'Kee has already brought a bunch of rare and exotic shit, and I have never been paid this much for a single order before. Life is good thanks to him (or her?), and is going to get even better!"
languages.original_text:
"День 21, третий месяц цикла...

languages.text:
「サイクルの3カ月目、21日…
やっと幸運と呼ぶにふさわしい結果が出た！大当たりだ！競合者が死んだネズミにつくノミみたいに次々と湧いている中、異種族の行商人、ストリクシスがちょうどいいタイミングで来てくれた。マードキーはすでに大量の希少品を納入してくれたし、1回の注文でこんなに金を儲けたのは初めてだ。彼（いや、彼女か？）のおかげで生活がだいぶ楽になった。これからどんどん良くなるぞ！」
languages.original_text:
"Day twenty-one, third month of the cycle...
Now that's what I call good fortune! We hit the jackpot. This xenos peddler, a Stryxis, sure did show up in time, the competitors have been popping up like fleas on a half-dead rat. Merd'Kee has already brought a bunch of rare and exotic shit, and I have never been paid this much for a single order before. Life is good thanks to him (or her?), and is going to get even better!"

traits.locale_text:
「サイクルの3カ月目、21日…
やっと幸運と呼ぶにふさわしい結果が出た！大当たりだ！競合者が死んだネズミにつくノミみたいに次々と湧いている中、異種族の行商人、ストリクシスがちょうどいいタイミングで来てくれた。マードキーはすでに大量の希少品を納入してくれたし、1回の注文でこんなに金を儲けたのは初めてだ。彼（いや、彼女か？）のおかげで生活がだいぶ楽になった。これからどんどん良くなるぞ！」

languages.text:
«Día veintiuno, tercer mes del ciclo...
¡Esto sí que es suerte! Nos ha tocado el gordo. Un buhonero xenos, un stryxis para ser exactos, ha llegado justo a tiempo. Nos estaban saliendo competidores como pulgas en una rata muerta. Merd'Kee ya nos ha traído un montón de mierda rara y exótica. En la vida había cobrado tanto por un solo cargamento. Nos va bien gracias a él (o ella), ¡y solo va a ir a mejor!».
languages.original_text:
"Day twenty-one, third month of the cycle...
Now that's what I call good fortune! We hit the jackpot. This xenos peddler, a Stryxis, sure did show up in time, the competitors have been popping up like fleas on a half-dead rat. Merd'Kee has already brought a bunch of rare and exotic shit, and I have never been paid this much for a single order before. Life is good thanks to him (or her?), and is going to get even better!"

Merd'Kee ya nos ha traído un montón de mierda rara y exótica. En la vida había cobrado tanto por un solo cargamento. Nos va bien gracias a él (o ella), ¡y solo va a ir a mejor!».

languages.text:
“本周期的第三个月，第二十一天……
我就说，咱们交好运了！这回可真是头彩。stryxis，那个异形商贩，那只斯特里西斯，真的准时送货了。我们的买家就像死耗子上的跳蚤一样冒了出来。莫德吉带来了那么多珍奇玩意儿，我从来没在一笔单子里挣过这么多钱。多亏了他（还是她？），生活越来越好喽！”
languages.original_text:
"Day twenty-one, third month of the cycle...
Now that's what I call good fortune! We hit the jackpot. This xenos peddler, a Stryxis, sure did show up in time, the competitors have been popping up like fleas on a half-dead rat. Merd'Kee has already brought a bunch of rare and exotic shit, and I have never been paid this much for a single order before. Life is good thanks to him (or her?), and is going to get even better!"

traits.locale_text:
“本周期的第三个月，第二十一天……
我就说，咱们交好运了！这回可真是头彩。stryxis，那个异形商贩，那只斯特里西斯，真的准时送货了。我们的买家就像死耗子上的跳蚤一样冒了出来。莫德吉带来了那么多珍奇玩意儿，我从来没在一笔单子里挣过这么多钱。多亏了他（还是她？），生活越来越好喽！”

languages.text:
« Vingt et unième jour, troisième mois du cycle...
Ça, c'est ce que j'appelle avoir du bol ! On a touché le jackpot. Ce colporteur xénos, un stryxis, s'est pointé juste à temps. Les concurrents sont de plus en plus nombreux, ça grouille comme des mouches sur un cadavre de rat. Mird'Kee a déjà apporté un tas de trucs rares et exotiques, et j'ai jamais reçu une aussi bonne paie pour une simple commande. Grâce à lui (à moins que ce soit "elle" ?), je mène la belle vie et ça devrait encore s'améliorer ! »
languages.original_text:
"Day twenty-one, third month of the cycle...
Now that's what I call good fortune! We hit the jackpot. This xenos peddler, a Stryxis, sure did show up in time, the competitors have been popping up like fleas on a half-dead rat. Merd'Kee has already brought a bunch of rare and exotic shit, and I have never been paid this much for a single order before. Life is good thanks to him (or her?), and is going to get even better!"

languages.text:
"Einundzwanzigster Tag des dritten Monats des Zyklus ...
Das nenne ich mal Glück! Wir haben das große Los gezogen. Dieser Xenos-Händler, ein Stryxis, ist genau zur rechten Zeit aufgetaucht. Die Konkurrenz vermehrt sich wie Flöhe auf einer halbtoten Ratte. Merd'kee hat schon einen Haufen seltenen und exotischen Scheiß gekauft, und ich habe noch nie für eine einzelne Bestellung so viel bezahlt bekommen. Dank ihm (oder ihr?) läuft mein Leben gerade wirklich prächtig, und es wird nur noch besser werden!"
languages.original_text:
"Day twenty-one, third month of the cycle...

languages.text:
"Döngünün üçüncü ayının yirmi birinci günü...
Durduk durduk, turnayı gözünden vurduk! Talih kuşu başımıza kondu. Stryxis ırkından şu tüccar zeno, gerçekten de zamanında geldi. Rakiplerimiz mantar gibi bitti durdu. Merd'Kee, bir sürü ender bulunan egzotik mal satın aldı bile. Ömrümde hiç tek bir siparişle bu kadar para kazanmamıştım. Bu adamın (kadın da olabilir) sayesinde hayat bize güzel ama daha da güzel olacak!"
languages.original_text:
"Day twenty-one, third month of the cycle...
Now that's what I call good fortune! We hit the jackpot. This xenos peddler, a Stryxis, sure did show up in time, the competitors have been popping up like fleas on a half-dead rat. Merd'Kee has already brought a bunch of rare and exotic shit, and I have never been paid this much for a single order before. Life is good thanks to him (or her?), and is going to get even better!"
